messages.message: Hey Maria, I'm so excited about the Valentine's Day party at Hobbs Cafe! Have you thought about what decorations we should use?

You see Isabella I have spent a lot of time with these preparations and from your side you seem to have settled down and left it all to me to do it all myself. Frankly, I have no desire to continue under these circumstances.
I'm so sorry Maria, I didn't mean to leave everything to you. Let's sit down together and discuss the decorations and preparations for the Valentine's Day party at Hobbs Cafe.

You don not seem to understand. I just told you that I am pissed of with this situation and your reply was to discuss about the preparations. I do not want be a part of this anymore. Find another sucker to run your errands

I apologize for the misunderstanding, Maria. I value your input and would like to work together on the decorations and preparations for the Valentine's Day party at Hobbs Cafe. Let's find a solution that works for both of us.
No there is no solution for this. I DO NOT WANT TO PARTICIPATE ON THIS. This is my final answer. Please leave me alone.
I understand your decision, Maria. I will respect your choice and handle the preparations for the Valentine's Day party at Hobbs Cafe on my own. Thank you for your previous help.

relationships.descr: Maria Lopez seems to be a dedicated and involved friend who is actively participating in the preparations for the Valentine's Day party at Hobbs Cafe. She also appears to have a close relationship with Isabella Rodriguez and is willing to help out with setting up decorations and bringing snacks for the party. Overall, Maria Lopez seems to be a supportive and reliable friend.
